divs: sighting detailsleaving my sons house at about 5:50 pm on 1\10\2013, as soon as i backed out his drive onto the road i saw 2 "bright" lights crossing the road. i was headed south, they were headed east. one above the other. i turned my radio off and listened , there was no sound. i then turned west on the next road to head home, looking up i saw 2 bright lights, one above the other , up high. but below the cloud bank. so i knew that it was not stars. they were not moving.just stationary. as i drove about 1 mile i looked away due to on comming car with brights on., for just a sec. when i looked back the lights were gone. i looked they were no where, but there was an airplane that came out of the ne. it was flying low. i assumed it was looking for the ufo"s.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Kingsville
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 2 bright lights crossing road, one above the other, then 1 to the west stationary up high. disappeared when plane came onto scene.
